n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
palindrome=function(x){
i=1
y=x
b=array(0)
while(x!=0){
  b[i]=x%%10
  x=x%/%10
  i=i+1
}
l=length(b)
a=0
for(i in l:1){
  a=a+b[l-i+1]*(10^(i-1))
}
return(a==y)
}
s=sum(sapply(arr,palindrome))
ifelse(s==length(arr),1,0)
